body.p: To provide information that is useful to users of financial statements, there should be a clear link between the hedge accounting information that is outside the primary financial statements and the hedge accounting within those. To provide such a link, the Board decided that an entity should provide hedge accounting disclosures by risk category. Consequently, an entity should disclose by risk category:

li.p: information that is not included in the primary financial statements (see paragraphs BC35P–BC35BB); and
information that is included in the primary financial statements (see paragraphs BC35CC–BC35SS).
